timeline.bodyText:
Please, remove the commented-out code.
BTW, won't it ruin the mapping when the preprocessor and parser return incompatible token streams?
timeline.author: temanbrcom

timeline.bodyText: I can't understand the logic here. Won't this token trigger in 88 VARNAME VALUE 'N'?
timeline.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText: It will not triggered in cobol , only triggered in exact sql
replies.author: asatklichov

timeline.bodyText:
This is for consistency with the preprocessor lexer to build mapping.
I don't see a token for INVALID_IDENTIFIER
timeline.author: temanbrcom

timeline.bodyText: Is it correct? How the user will see it?
timeline.author: temanbrcom

timeline.bodyText: Why is this file left empty?
timeline.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText: There is story "Redesign Grammar", so we will extract CICS only words here, currently we took all under CommonLexer.
replies.author: asatklichov
